casebody.data:
(First Circuit—Hamilton Co., O., Circ’t Court Jan. Term, 1899.) Before Hale, Marvin and Caldwell, JJ.

[of the Eighth Circuit, sitting in the First Circuit.]

SMITH v. MORRIS. Frivolous answer — Power of court to strike from files— See s. c., 41 W. L. B., 41. Error to the Court of Common Pleas of Cuyahoga county. PER CURIAM.

The power to strike a frivolous answer from the flies is inherent in the court.
